attributes.action: To change how the child maintenance service work out.
attributes.additional_details: I My self pay child maintenance and pay a lots of money to my ex partner. I been having problem with csa they don't come back to me when they say they do and leave you hanging for months with out a answer. They don't take in to account that you have bills to pay  I'm financially struggling to pay my bills every month. I have two young children to support at home and a wife I'm struggling to live and  have no money todo anything with all I get told is I have to pay...
attributes.background: Change how child maintenance service is worked out not on gross income and work it out after cost of living

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about how child maintenance is calculated, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220699

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
